messages.title: Meg on your side in Hackney
messages.content: "Education has been transformed in Hackney. Five brand new secondary schools and the best exam results ever. New primary schools and 12 Sure Start centres."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continue to work to make sure that Hackney's police have the support they need to clear our streets of crime.
More school improvements and new health centres.
Will continue to help individuals solve their problems. Have helped 11,000 people so far.
Tax credits will be safe under Labour.
Argued for decent homes for all and pressed hard for more affordable family homes. The first new council homes in a generation will be built in Homerton thanks to Government cash.
Championed the need for new transport links. With the east London line opening, there will be 10 trains an hour and late night opening on the north London line.
Campaigned tirelessly for investment in Hackney's schools, health services and housing. Hackney has seen real wins because of Labour investment including 5 new schools and 12 Sure Start centres.

issues.education: Education has been transformed in Hackney with new schools and excellent exam results.

housing.content: Better housing for Hackney families has been a priority, with efforts to provide decent homes for all, and new council homes being built.

images.caption: Crime is down to a record low in Hackney
Meg Hillier YOUR LABOUR CANDIDATE FOR HACKNEY SOUTH AND SHOREDITCH
